## Overview
Short description of this example. You can add images, links, and details here.

```{r}
library(leaflet)
lat <- 40.7794; lon <- -73.9632
leaflet() |>
  addTiles() |>
  setView(lng = lon, lat = lat, zoom = 13) |>
  addMarkers(lng = lon, lat = lat, popup = "Some text")
```
